content.rendered:
Alexandria Pacho

Payroll Specialist 
BA in Psychology: San Jose State University

 

Hi, I’m Alexandria Pacho. As a payroll specialist, I work on processing timecards for temporary personnel. I enter all employee hours into a Invoice Tracking System. I reconcile invoices and payroll reports. I also prepare, print and distribute client invoices. I assist with processing weekly payroll as well as handling any payroll related issues (deductions, garnishments, taxes, etc.)

 

ADVICE FOR CANDIDATES:

Be honest and upfront with your abilities. Confidence is Key!

 

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTES: 

“Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, LOVE of what you are doing.” – Pele
